bibl.title: The Date of the Rhabdouchoi and the Early Career of Plato Comicus.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - I. Plato's First Victory. - II. P. Oxy. XXXV, 2737 (= M.-P.3 157.1; LDAB 345) and Plato's Peisander. - III. Producers or Collaboration? - IV. Plato, Kantharos and the Symmachia. - V. Plato's Early Career.
HARTWIG Andrew, The Date of the Rhabdouchoi and the Early Career of Plato Comicus.
